General.Name: TOWA Corporation
General.Description: TOWA Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, and sells semiconductor manufacturing equipment and high-precision molds in Japan and internationally. The company's products include molding equipment, singulation equipment, ultra-precision molds, THPL-CBN end mills, and TEN-systems. It also sells used equipment. The company was formerly known as TOWA Precision Industries Limited and changed its name to TOWA Corporation in December 1988. TOWA Corporation was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.
